# serval_custom_service (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "serval_custom_service" "example_custom_service" {
  name = "name"
  team_id = "teamId"
  domain = "domain"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the custom service (e.g., "Internal HR System").
- `team_id` (String) The ID of the team.

### Optional

- `domain` (String) The domain for branding/logo lookup (e.g., "hr.company.com").

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the custom service.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
$ terraform import serval_custom_service.example '<id>'
```
